title: Different wards
body: So now we have sight wards and control wards, how about having the farsight trinket show stealthed champs like kha and vayne, so that there is SOME counterplay to the ridiculous invisibility changes. seriously, i have a shaco the other game q from halfway down river and get to get to my mid laner and blow him up. there is no counterplay to the khazix and vaynes that can do right up to you and blow you up.

replies.body: oracle sees outliines, but you cant target them, so why not let the blue trinket, which is pretty lackluster, compared to the other two imo, give true sight. so thst supports have to choose between clearing wards or revealing enemy champs

I do find it very strange that they talked all of last season (and the season before) about adding counterplay, removing RNG and all this crap.

Then they add "random dragons" and remove the counterplay to Vayne, Shaco and Wukong.

Remove pinks fine. But atleast let Oracles see their outlines still.
